rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BEW4000} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
(Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 06PG, 09, 09-1, 09-4} and Must be enrolled in course version {3169, 3845})
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BEW4000} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course version {3169, 3845, 4414}

description: Students work under the guidance of a supervisor to plan, carry out, and report on an original research project that addresses a significant issues in business; this research project is likely to have substantial practical outcomes or implications; as well, it is hoped that students and supervisors will publish the work in an appropriate journal.
